definition[0]: a man who is handsome looks attractive
example[1]: Sam was tall, dark, and handsome.
definition[1]: a woman who is handsome looks attractive in a strong healthy way
definition[2]: an animal, object, or building that is handsome looks attractive in an impressive way
example[3]: a row of handsome Georgian houses
definition[3]: a handsome amount of money is large
example[4]: He managed to make a handsome profit out of the deal.
definition[4]: a handsome gift or prize is worth a lot of money
example[6]: There are some handsome prizes to be won.
definition[5]: a handsome victory is important and impressive
example[7]: They won a handsome victory in the elections.
